highlights: Coached, trained, and provided feedback to improve employees' volume of outbound calls which increased sales and conversion and sales
Compiled success reports on client relationships to represent our location in weekly executive meetings
Educated staff on compensation stucture to encourage higher sales volume
Created and developed both business and consumer relationships leading to improved and consistent sales
Achieved highest sales in store for two consecutive months and held a consistent 90% score for the Rogers “Mystery Shopper” assessment
Qualified right fit for a range of demographics of potential and existing customers, increasing store sales and achieving quota targets
Lead a positive work environment to promote team building and great customer service
Took initiative to assist with the onboarding and training of new hires with a focus on promoting self-sufficient behaviours

education.area: Honors Psychology, Double Minor, Human Resources Management & Philosophy

awards.summary: Maintained a cumulative overall average of 80% or higher
